name: Iguana
description: Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000 species, ranging across all continents.

name: Gecko
description: Geckos are lizards belonging to the infraorder Gekkota, found in warm climates throughout the world across all continents.

name: Chameleon
description: Chameleons are a distinctive and highly specialized clade of lizards, found in warm climates throughout the world.
